text: Dumbledore nodded glumly. It's true, faltered Professor McGonagall. After all he's done, all the people he's killed, he couldn't kill a little boy. It's just astounding, of all the things to stop him. But how in the name of heaven did Harry survive? We can only guess, said Dumbledore. We may never know.

segments.text: After all he's done, all the people he's killed,
he couldn't kill a little boy.
It's just astounding, of all the things to stop him.
But how in the name of heaven did Harry survive?
We can only guess, said Dumbledore.
